description: Perform B1 field inhomogeneity correction for a DWI volume series using either ANTs or FSL.

algorithm.title: Algorithm
algorithm.description: Select the algorithm to be used for bias correction. Options are: ants, fsl

input_image.title: Input Image
input_image.description: The input image series to be corrected

grad.title: Gradient Table (MRtrix format)
grad.description: Provide the diffusion gradient table in MRtrix format

bvecs.title: bvecs
bvecs.description: Provide the diffusion-weighted gradient scheme used in the acquisition in FSL bvecs/bvals format files. If a diffusion gradient scheme is present in the input image header, the data provided with this option will be instead used.

bvals.title: bvals
bvals.description: Provide the diffusion-weighted gradient scheme used in the acquisition in FSL bvecs/bvals format files. If a diffusion gradient scheme is present in the input image header, the data provided with this option will be instead used.

anyOf.description: Provide the diffusion-weighted gradient scheme used in the acquisition in FSL bvecs/bvals format files. If a diffusion gradient scheme is present in the input image header, the data provided with this option will be instead used.

fslgrad.description: Provide the diffusion-weighted gradient scheme used in the acquisition in FSL bvecs/bvals format files. If a diffusion gradient scheme is present in the input image header, the data provided with this option will be instead used.

mask_image.title: Mask Image
mask_image.description: Manually provide a mask image for bias field estimation

nocleanup.title: No Cleanup
nocleanup.description: Do not delete intermediate files during script execution, and do not delete scratch directory at script completion

scratch_dir.title: Scratch Directory
scratch_dir.description: Manually specify the path in which to generate the scratch directory

continue_scratch_dir.title: Continue Scratch Directory
continue_scratch_dir.description: Continue the script from a previous execution; must provide the scratch directory path

quiet.title: Quiet Mode
quiet.description: Do not display information messages or progress status

nthreads.title: Number of Threads
nthreads.description: Use this number of threads in multi-threaded applications (set to 0 to disable multi-threading)

key.title: key
key.description: temporarily set the value of an MRtrix config file entry.

value.title: value
value.description: temporarily set the value of an MRtrix config file entry.

items.description: temporarily set the value of an MRtrix config file entry.

config.description: temporarily set the value of an MRtrix config file entry.

ants_b.title: ANTS N4 Bias Field Correction -b
ants_b.description: N4BiasFieldCorrection option -b (initial mesh resolution in mm, spline order)

ants_c.title: ANTS N4 Bias Field Correction -c
ants_c.description: N4BiasFieldCorrection option -c (number of iterations, convergence threshold)

ants_s.title: ANTS N4 Bias Field Correction -s
ants_s.description: N4BiasFieldCorrection option -s (shrink-factor applied to spatial dimensions)
